body_html: Spent last two days trying to build Tensorflow from source (r1.4) for my MacBook Pro with an eGPU. Driver working, with Cuda 8.0, cuDNN 6.0, Mac OSX Sierra 10.12. Very close to end, but blocked by some build errors after 20 minutes. Anybody has had luck so far? Any successfully built package that you can share? Thanks in advance.
